source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Acrylic lesson - Mediterranean city - Landscape

visible_instructors.job_title: Watercolor and Acrylic Artist and Art Tutor
visible_instructors.title: Ekaterina Fedorova
visible_instructors.name: Ekaterina

items.headline: We learn how to paint the Mediterranean city Seascape step-by-step!
objectives_summary: Discover how you can paint landscape: how to plan layers for it, what parts to paint and in what order, how to go from the general to the specific
Learn acrylic painting techniques: layering, blending, detailing, glazing
Learn acrylic painting basics: values, color mixing, issue fixing

items.title: How to draw and paint in FREE style watercolor this puppy.

visible_instructors.job_title: Professional artist based in North Wales and painting Tutor
visible_instructors.title: David Walker
visible_instructors.name: David

items.headline: Learn how I draw and paint in watercolor my popular pet portraits,right from the start through to the finished painting.
objectives_summary: I will start with a blank piece of watercolor paper and take you step by step through every phase of producing this drawing and painting.
I will show you how to trace an image using either the photograph or the template which I have provided.
I will show you every step in my drawing,how I use just one pencil and my putty rubber to shade and shape my work.

items.title: Hand Embroidery: Blend Colors in Your Embroidery Piece
items.headline: Learn how to paint with thread
objectives_summary: How to paint with thread and use colors

items.title: The Art Adventurers Acrylics and Colour Mixing Course
items.headline: A Fine Art Course for Beginners.
objectives_summary: how to paint with acrylics
they'll learn about the colour wheel and how to mix colours.
What primary, secondary, complementary, analogous, and tertiary  colours are.

items.title: Learning About Wood: how to become a successful woodworker.
items.headline: Describes woods structure, characteristics, and limitations - things that every woodworker should know.
objectives_summary: The structure of wood
Parts of a tree trunk
A description of some wood species

items.title: How To Paint From Photo References

visible_instructors.job_title: Learn To Paint Loose With Acrylics & Watercolor
visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner
visible_instructors.name: Robert

items.headline: Without copying every detail. All mediums are welcome.
objectives_summary: How to use photo reference without copying image & details
How to use photo as a starting point only
How to extract focal points

items.title: Phad Rajashthani Painting: Indian Traditional Old Folk Art
items.headline: Kalyani joshi PHAD Painting on canvas Pabuji PHAD Drawing Bhilwara Rajasthani canvas beginner devnarayan pabuji Art
objectives_summary: Folk art
Indian traditional art
Phad painting

items.title: Sketching for Beginners

visible_instructors.job_title: Fine Artist , Online Educator , Creative Entrepreneur
visible_instructors.title: Maibis Navarro
visible_instructors.name: Maibis

items.headline: 3 Simple Techniques for Landscape Sketching
objectives_summary: You will sketch a landscape quickly and effortlessly

items.title: Start an effective daily drawing practice

visible_instructors.job_title: Fine Artist, Sculptor, Illustrator, and Engineer
visible_instructors.title: Mandar Marathe
visible_instructors.name: Mandar

items.headline: 30 simple drawing prompts and demos to kick start your daily drawing practice.
objectives_summary: See the improvement in their drawing skill
Be able to chose a subject for drawing on their own and know that "what" you draw is not so important.
Get a sense of achievement by drawing everyday for 30 days.

items.title: Introduction to Cro-Tatting, Tunisian, and Filet Crochet
items.headline: Intermediate Crochet Methods
objectives_summary: Engage with video, Q&A, and image-based, intermediate-level lessons!
Crochet simple and knit Tunisian stitches
Change color in Tunisian crochet rows

items.title: Creative Color - for Fine Art Painters!

visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Painter, International Author & Art Instructor
visible_instructors.title: Nancy Reyner
visible_instructors.name: Nancy

items.headline: Inspiring new ways for painters to use color! Any medium or style will benefit.
objectives_summary: Painting techniques, tinting, color finishing tips for panel sides, color variety, creating spatial depth.
Optimal color palettes
Color blending techniques

items.title: Watercolor with Me: Beautiful Birch Trees
items.headline: Paint beautiful loose watercolor birch trees with a palette knife.
objectives_summary: How to paint loose, impressionistic, beautiful birch trees with watercolor!
We will be using an unusual tool for watercolor - a palette knife!  That's right - we are using a palette knife to paint with watercolor!
We will also experiment with watercolor crystals called Brusho.

items.title: Rose cake watermelon carving for party
items.headline: This course for beginner level. you will learn how to do watermelon cake for party.
objectives_summary: How to choose watermelon and honeydew
learn how to carve rose watermelon
How to carve watermelon leaf for decoration

items.title: How to draw Chibi Anime Style (Digital)

visible_instructors.job_title: 日本アニメーション、モチベーション、コンサルティング
visible_instructors.title: 株式会社 WhiteLuckConsulting
visible_instructors.name: 株式会社

items.headline: Step by Step to draw Chibi with Japanese Anime & Manga style with tips
objectives_summary: How to draw Japanese manga ( 日本のマンガの描き方  )
A series of steps to draw Japanese drawing style ( 可愛いアニメスタイルで描く一連の手順 )

items.title: How to Make An Embroidery Pattern for selling on Etsy
items.headline: In this course I will guide you step by step on how to make an embroidery pattern that you can sell on Etsy.
objectives_summary: How to make an embroidery pattern that you can use for passive income

items.title: Spark your Creativity & Imagination & prevent getting stuck
items.headline: Get your creative juices flowing & keep them going - overcoming art block and getting stuck as an artist (digital also)
objectives_summary: Methods to spark your creativity
How to unlock your imagination
Overcoming art(ist) block
